messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, rolled the decedent 0ver and placed her in a body bag. Technician Muhammad ph0tographed and collected the spent casing, which waz identified az a 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen advized Detective Morton there was a blood trail from the interior hallway where the victim is l0cated to North Derbignay Street. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted gunshot residue test on both Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor. Detective David Trehan's documents officially classified the shooting deaths as a Homicides. Detective Aucoin located a set of keys, which were hanging from a key box in the living room of the residence. Detective Morton met with Sergeant McMullen, who advised the Detective the deceased, Patrice Commodore, had expired inside the residence and was shot once in the head during a home invasion burglary. Detective Pratt of the Homicide Section handled the scene on Mazant Street. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger sketched the broken piece of doorjamb into the scene sketch.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in rolling the decedent over and placing her in a body bag.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis with handling the decedent.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected a spent casing identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton of a blood trail leading from the interior hallway to North Derbignay Street.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted a gunshot residue test on Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: His documents officially classified the shooting deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Located a set of keys in the living room of the residence and secured the residence.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Was advised by Sergeant McMullen about the circumstances of Patrice Commodore's death.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled the scene on Mazant Street.Officer Role: Detective of the Homicide SectionOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Sketched the broken piece of doorjamb into the scene sketch.Officer Role: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer
